Description.summary: Built user-focused solutions leveraging modern frontend technologies.
bulletPoints: Built test account authentication website using React and TanStack React-Query for TV streaming software.
Handled refresh and account JWT tokens alongside localStorage for data storing and retrieval.

Description.summary: Developed innovative solutions to process and visualize structured data.
bulletPoints: Built Python data pipeline that converts 2000-page PDF data into graphical form using Neo4j.
Utilized prompt engineering to transform BC Building Code manual into structured JSON data.
Designed and implemented schema to represent building codes' hierarchical and logical relationships.

Description.summary: Created a full-stack application to drive sustainability efforts.
bulletPoints: Ideated, designed, and implemented full-stack application to aggregate real-time carbon emissions data.
Projected a savings of $4 million annually for RBC.
Designed user flow based on research from 25+ SME interviews and created multiple Figma UI/UX prototypes.
Developed React frontend with ChartJS for data visualization and custom React hooks using Axios.
Deployed through Helios in OCP4 with SSO via Azure AD OAuth 2.0 flow.

Description.summary: Improved internal applications for RBC to enhance user experience.
bulletPoints: Consolidated and displayed all RBC apps into a React component for easy access using data from Node API.
Added search and favorite functionality with localStorage for user convenience.
Shipped a new navigation bar to internal RBC domains, increasing website traffic by 40%.
Contributed backend function to return HTML files given a URL for frontend iframe display.
